sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO key_value_config_info ( id, config_key, config_value, gmt_create, gmt_modify ) VALUES ( #id#, #configKey#, #configValue#, now(), now() )
select last_insert_id() as ID from key_value_config_info limit 1
sqlMap.select: SELECT id, config_key, config_value, gmt_create, gmt_modify FROM key_value_config_info WHERE config_key = #configKey#
sqlMap.update: update key_value_config_info set gmt_modify = now(), config_value = #configValue# where config_key=#configKey#
